The jar file is now an executable jar. If you have your JDK bin directory in your path, you can run:
java -jar shen-on-java.jar


This software is subject to the Shen license. See LICENSE.txt

Documentation is forming at:
http://www.mentics.com/wk/shen/java/shen_on_java

Source code is available at:
https://www.assembla.com/code/shen-on-java/git/nodes
